rhythms.description: The color of the rhythm text and stems below the arrows.

headers.description: The color of the articulations and header text above the arrows.

beatTextHeight.description: The height of the space reserved for rhythm text below the arrows.

beatFontSize.description: The relative font-size of the rhythm text below the arrows, as a fraction of its height (`beatTextHeight`).

headerTextHeight.description: The height of the space reserved for articulations and header text above the arrows.

headerFontSize.description: The relative font-size of the articulations and header text above the arrows, as a fraction of its height (`headerFontSize`).

tripletFontSize.description: The actual font-size of the triplet label, if applicable.

width.description:
The width of each strum arrow.
This is also the width of the space reserved for each "rhythmic column" composed of arrow, header text, and beat text.

height.description: The height of each strum arrow.

gap.description: The horizontal space between each strum

strokeWidth.description: The stroke width of the rhythm stems/beams below the arrows.

stemHeight.description: The vertical length of the beam stems.
